title: Defense
description: News, Analysis and Opinion from POLITICO

entries.title: Austin's chief of staff stepping down
entries.description: Kelly Magsamen drew criticism for her role in the controversy surrounding the Pentagon chief's secret hospitalization.

entries.title: Mass parachute jump over Normandy kicks off commemorations for 80th anniversary of D-Day
entries.description: Some of the last veterans, now in their late nineties or even older, are coming back to remember fallen friends.

entries.title: Retired Navy admiral arrested on bribery charges
entries.description: Two business executives were also arrested.

entries.title: How Biden got to a ‘yes’ on letting Ukraine hit inside Russia
entries.description: A coalition of officials and lawmakers in Kyiv and Washington raced behind the scenes as the assault on Kharkiv roared on.

entries.title: ‘War has found them’: Biden's Ukraine gamble sets a new course
entries.description: The president was convinced to take the risk by his team and pressure from allies.

entries.title: Biden secretly gave Ukraine permission to strike inside Russia with US weapons
entries.description: It's a major reversal that will help Ukraine to better defend its second-largest city.

entries.title: US military sees ‘value’ in letting Ukraine strike Russia with US weapons
entries.description: The Biden administration is under increasing pressure to lift restrictions on U.S.-supplied long-range weapons.

entries.title: Top Biden aides signal openness to letting Ukraine strike Russia with US weapons
entries.description: No final decision has been made, but the consideration comes amid mounting pressure from allies and Democrats.

entries.title: Netanyahu blasts Biden admin for rejecting GOP effort to sanction ICC
entries.description: Previously, the Biden administration signaled it would support a Republican-led congressional move to punish the war crimes court.

entries.title: Aid deliveries suspended after rough seas damage US-built temporary pier in Gaza
entries.description: The setback is the latest for the $320 million pier, which has already had three U.S. service member injuries and had four of its vessels beached due to heavy seas.

entries.title: Austin to transfer power during scheduled medical procedure
entries.description: The defense secretary set off a wave of controversy in January when he failed to notify the White House of his hospitalization.

entries.title: Kenya to get major non-NATO ally status during president’s US state visit
entries.description: The mostly symbolic move comes right before Kenya is expected to send 1,000 police officers to quell gang violence in Haiti.

entries.title: Aid starts to flow into Gaza through military pier after days of delays
entries.description: Deliveries to the warehouses were temporarily halted after hungry Palestinians looted several of the initial U.N. trucks.

entries.title: Biden admin openly hammering Israel’s military strategy in Gaza
entries.description: A parade of top officials has ratcheted up their criticism of Israel, signaling deep frustration with the country’s anti-Hamas campaign.

entries.title: Biden’s top military adviser chides Israel for losing ground to Hamas
entries.description: Gen. C.Q. Brown has rarely spoken negatively about Israeli forces.

entries.title: Blinken orders crackdown on Israel-Hamas leaks
entries.description: The secretary’s message has been delivered to every corner of the State Department.

entries.title: US to complete troop withdrawal from Niger by mid-September, Pentagon says
entries.description: The timeline followed four days of talks in the capital city of Niamey.

entries.title: US military says Gaza Strip pier project is completed, aid to soon flow as Israel-Hamas war rages on
entries.description: The maritime route is designed to bolster the amount of aid getting into the Gaza Strip.

entries.title: Confused about Biden’s Israel weapons policy? Here’s what you should know.
entries.description: What’s on hold, what’s in review and what’s still flowing.

entries.title: Even Democrats don’t get what Biden’s Israel weapons policy is
entries.description: The news of a potential weapons package following a pause in bomb deliveries has caused confusion.

entries.title: US greenlights potential weapons sale to Israel
entries.description: The Biden administration has informally told top lawmakers it has greenlit the potential sale of more than $1 billion in arms and ammunition to Israel.

entries.title: Ukraine presses Biden to lift ban on using US weapons to strike Russia
entries.description: Kyiv watched as Russians massed on the border, but they weren't allowed to use long-range missiles provided by Washington.

entries.title: White House opposes House bill to force Israeli arm shipments
entries.description: The measure would force the U.S. to send bombs that have been delayed over Israel's conduct in Gaza.

entries.title: Blinken reiterates human rights findings on Israel
entries.description: A report released Friday found that Israeli forces may have violated international humanitarian law, though it did not formally find that they had done so.

entries.title: Biden admin punts on declaring Israel violated international law
entries.description: A new State Department report, criticized as inconclusive, drew immediate fire from both progressive Democrats and Republicans.

entries.title: Pentagon orders all US combat troops to withdraw from Niger
entries.description: The timeline could still shift and congressional negotiations are ongoing.

entries.title: US to announce new $400 million military aid package for Ukraine
entries.description: The package comes as Russia launches a major offensive in Kharkiv.

entries.title: ‘We would need to make choices’: Why Biden is threatening Israel now
entries.description: Biden’s announcement is an unintentional admission that his efforts to privately sway Netanyahu have had limited effects.

entries.title: Austin confirms US pausing bomb shipments to Israel, but commitment still ‘ironclad’
entries.description: The Pentagon chief stressed that no final decision has been made.

entries.title: US pauses shipment of bombs Israel could use in Rafah
entries.description: The decision comes amid international outrage over civilian deaths.
